title: Gates Cambridge Scholarship
description: Prestigious scholarship for outstanding applicants from outside the UK to pursue a full-time postgraduate degree at Cambridge. Moroccan students are eligible.

title: Fulbright Foreign Student Program
description: Provides grants for international students, including Moroccans, to study and conduct research in the United States at accredited institutions.

title: Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters
description: High-quality international study programmes jointly delivered by consortia of European higher education institutions. Open to Moroccan students.

title: DAAD Scholarship Germany
description: Scholarships for international students, including Moroccans, at German universities with excellent academic records.

title: Chevening Scholarships
description: UK government's global scholarship programme for future leaders, including Moroccan applicants, to pursue one-year master's degrees in the UK.

title: Australia Awards Scholarship
description: Long-term development awards for citizens of participating countries, including Morocco, to undertake full-time study at Australian universities.

title: Swiss Government Excellence Scholarships
description: Research scholarships for foreign scholars and artists, including Moroccan students, holding a master's degree or equivalent.

title: Rhodes Scholarship
description: The oldest and most celebrated international fellowship, bringing students from around the world, including Morocco, to Oxford University.

title: Moroccan Government Scholarships (AMCI)
description: Scholarships funded by the Moroccan Agency for International Cooperation for Moroccan and international students to study in Morocco.

title: University Mohammed VI Polytechnic (UM6P) Scholarships
description: UM6P scholarships aim to support Moroccan and African students, especially women, for various academic programs.
